mapper.select: SELECT CMP_USER.CMP_USER_ID AS userId, CMP_USER.CMP_USER_NAME AS userName, CMP_USER.CMP_GROUP_ID AS groupId, CMP_GROUP.CMP_GROUP_NAME AS groupName, CMP_USER.CMP_SERIAL_NUMBER AS serialNumber FROM CMP_USER, CMP_GROUP WHERE CMP_USER.CMP_GROUP_ID = CMP_GROUP.CMP_GROUP_ID ORDER BY CMP_USER.CMP_GROUP_ID ASC, CMP_USER.CMP_SERIAL_NUMBER ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT CMP_USER.CMP_EMAIL AS email, CMP_USER.CMP_PASSWORD AS password FROM CMP_USER WHERE CMP_USER.CMP_EMAIL = #{email} AND CMP_USER.CMP_PASSWORD = #{password}
